data.title: Order of Eoin Colfer Books
data.meta_description: This is the Order of Eoin Colfer Books in both chronological order and publication order. List verified daily and newest books added immediately.
data.text:
Eoin Colfer is an Irish novelist of science fiction, fantasy, adventure and children’s books. He is best known for his Artemis Fowl books. Colfer was asked by Douglas Adams‘ widow to write a sixth book to his Hitchhiker’s Guide to the Galaxy series, And Another Thing…, which was published in 2009.

Eoin Colfer began his literary career as a children’s author, writing Benny and Omar in 1998. He would begin his Artemis Fowl YA series in 2001. Below is a list of Eoin Colfer’s books in order of when they were originally released:

Get notified when Eoin Colfer releases a new book at BookNotification.com.

Kids' Night In(2005)Amazon.com | Amazon.deWizards / Dark Alchemy(2007)Amazon.com | Amazon.deMidnight Feast(2007)Amazon.com | Amazon.deClick(2007)Amazon.com | Amazon.deFree?: Stories About Human Rights(2009)Amazon.com | Amazon.deGuys Read: Funny Business(2010)Amazon.com | Amazon.deDoctor Who: 11 Doctors, 11 Stories(2013)Amazon.com | Amazon.deBeyond the Stars: Twelve Tales of Adventure, Magic and Wonder(2014)Amazon.com | Amazon.deDoctor Who: 12 Doctors, 12 Stories(2014)Amazon.com | Amazon.deOnce Upon a Place(2015)Amazon.com | Amazon.deDoctor Who: Thirteen Doctors, 13 Stories(2019)Amazon.com | Amazon.de

Notes: And Another Thing… is co-authored with Douglas Adams. Click is a multi-author collaboration with David Almond, Roddy Doyle, Deborah Ellis, Nick Hornby, Margo Lanagan, Gregory Maguire, Ruth Ozeki, Linda Sue Park and Tim Wynne-Jones. Kids’ Night In: Warchild also contain stories by Annie Dalton, Michael Morpurgo, Garth Nix, Darren Shan and Jacqueline Wilson.

Free?: Stories Celebrating Human Rights also contains stories by David Almond, Ibtisam Barakat, Malorie Blackman, Theresa Breslin, Roddy Doyle, Ursula Dubosarsky, Jamila Gavin, Patricia McCormick, Margaret Mahy, Michael Morpurgo, Sarah Mussi, Meja Mwangi and Rita Williams-Garcia. Midnight Feast: Warchild also contains stories by Meg Cabot, Anthony Horowitz, Garth Nix, Louise Rennison and Darren Shan.

If You Like Eoin Colfer Books, You’ll Love…

Rick Riordan

John Flanagan

Christopher Paolini

We do our best to get everything listed but the occasional book gets by us. If you see anything missing please let us know so we can add it ASAP. You can also use this form to request we add new authors. Thanks. You can also e-mail us with any feedback at site@orderofbooks.com.
